quotes.quote: It's harder to reach teenagers. They don't want to hear one more lecture.
All the teenagers I know are against it; all the parents are for it. I'm going to come down on the side of the parents because they do know best.
Teenagers today are more free to be themselves and to accept themselves.
Adolescents are not monsters. They are just people trying to learn how to make it among the adults in the world, who are probably not so sure themselves.
To an adolescent, there is nothing in the world more embarrassing than a parent.
Teenagers who are never required to vacuum are living in one.
Teenagers today are more free to be themselves and to accept themselves.
Adolescence: A stage between infancy and adultery.
Everything about my teenage life was almost ideal.
My teenage years were exactly what they were supposed to be. Everybody has their own path. It's laid out for you. It's just up to you to walk it.
I don't know what better teenage life you could get than going around the world doing what you love to do.
Teenagers are free verse walking around on two legs.
A lot of the problems teenagers go through, it's better for them to go through them on their own. If you always have a crutch, you don't learn anything.
Young people are in a condition like permanent intoxication, because youth is sweet and they are growing.
My teenage years were exactly what they were supposed to be. Everybody has their own path. It's laid out for you. It's just up to you to walk it.
If you are not willing to look stupid, nothing great is ever going to happen to you.
Don't laugh at a youth for his affectations; he is only trying on one face after another to find a face of his own.
